 if (newWindow)
 window.open(url, '_blank');
 else
 document.location = url;
 }
 function $(id) { return document.getElementById(id); }
 var loadQueue = [];
 function runOnLoad(fn) { loadQueue.push(fn); }
 window.onload = function() {
 for (var i = 0; i < loadQueue.length; i++)
 loadQueue[i]();
 delete loadQueue;
 };

  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
    color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }



        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */
          --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
          --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
          --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
          font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
          color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
        }
        main {
          border-top: var(--chops-normal-border);
        }
        .snackbar-container {
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 1em;
          left: 1em;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
          z-index: 1000;
        }
        /** Unfix <chops-snackbar> to allow stacking. */
        chops-snackbar {
          position: static;
          margin-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .project-alert {
          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;
          font-weight: bold;
          text-align: center;
        }
      

<style>
        
  :host {
    --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
    --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
    --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
    color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /** Converts a <button> to look like an <a> tag. */
  .linkify {
    display: inline;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    background: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    background: none;
  }
  a, chops-button, a.button, .button, .linkify {
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: var(--chops-link-font-weight);
    font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
  }
  a:hover, .linkify:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    /* Links that look like buttons. */
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
  }
  a.button:hover, .button:hover {
    filter: brightness(95%);
  }
  chops-button, a.button, .button {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
    background: var(--chops-white);
    border-radius: 6px;
    --chops-button-padding: 0.25em 8px;
    margin: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
  a.button, .button {
    padding: var(--chops-button-padding);
  }
  chops-button i.material-icons, a.button i.material-icons, .button i.material-icons {
    display: block;
    margin-right: 4px;
  }
  chops-button.emphasized, a.button.emphasized, .button.emphasized {
    background: var(--chops-primary-button-bg);
    color: var(--chops-primary-button-color);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.25);
  }
  textarea, select, input {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
  }
  /* Note: decoupling heading levels from styles is useful for
  * accessibility because styles will not always line up with semantically
  * appropriate heading levels.
  */
  .medium-heading {
    font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0.25em 0;
    color: var(--chops-link-color);
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 0.25em;
    border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
  }
  .medium-heading chops-button {
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  .input-grid {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
    display: grid;
    max-width: 100%;
    grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
    grid-template-columns: minmax(120px, max-content) 1fr;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .input-grid label {
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: right;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .input-grid label {
      margin-top: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .input-grid {
      grid-gap: var(--mr-input-grid-gap);
      grid-template-columns: 100%;
    }
  }

        mr-app {
          display: block;
          padding-top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent a double border from showing up. */

          /* From shared-styles.js. */
          --mr-edit-field-padding: 0.125em 4px;
          --mr-edit-field-width: 90%;
          --mr-input-grid-gap: 6px;
          font-family: var(--chops-font-family);
          color: var(--chops-primary-font-color);
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
        }
        main {
          border-top: var(--chops-normal-border);
        }
        .snackbar-container {
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 1em;
          left: 1em;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
          z-index: 1000;
        }
        /** Unfix <chops-snackbar> to allow stacking. */
        chops-snackbar {
          position: static;

        .project-alert {
          background: var(--chops-orange-50);
          color: var(--chops-field-error-color);
          display: block;

Issue list



<span class="help-title"><!---->Issue list<!----></span>

<kbd><!---->k<!----></kbd>


                    

 / 

<span class="key-separator"> / </span>


                  




                    



j



<kbd><!---->j<!----></kbd>


                    

 / 

<span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>


                  



:
                

<span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->k<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator"> / </span>
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->j<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>
                  <!---->:
                </span>


                



up/down in the list



<span class="key-tip"><!---->up/down in the list<!----></span>


              




                


                  




                    



o



<kbd><!---->o<!----></kbd>


                    

 / 

<span class="key-separator"> / </span>


                  




                    



Enter



<kbd><!---->Enter<!----></kbd>


                    

 / 

<span class="key-separator" hidden=""> / </span>


                  



:
                

<span class="key-shortcut">
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->o<!----></kbd>
                    <span class="key-separator"> / </span>
                  <!---->
                    <kbd><!---->Enter<!----></kbd>

        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }
      

<style>
        mr-issue-page {
          --mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding: 12px;
          --mr-toggled-font-family: inherit;
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-open-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[issueClosed] {
          --monorail-metadata-toggled-bg: var(--monorail-metadata-closed-bg);
        }
        mr-issue-page[codeFont] {
          --mr-toggled-font-family: Monospace;
        }
        .container-issue {
          width: 100%;
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          z-index: 200;
        }
        .container-issue-content {
          padding: 0;
          flex-grow: 1;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          padding-top: 0.5em;
        }
        .container-outside {
          box-sizing: border-box;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 100%;
          margin: auto;
          padding: 0;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: space-between;
          flex-direction: row;
          flex-wrap: no-wrap;
        }
        .container-no-issue {
          padding: 0.5em 16px;
          font-size: var(--chops-large-font-size);
        }
        .metadata-container {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background: var(--monorail-metadata-toggled-bg);
          border-right: var(--chops-normal-border);
          border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          width: 24em;
          min-width: 256px;
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          z-index: 100;
        }
        .issue-header-container {
          z-index: 10;
          position: sticky;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          margin-bottom: 0.25em;
          width: 100%;
        }
        mr-issue-details {
          min-width: 50%;
          max-width: 1000px;
          flex-grow: 1;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
        }
        mr-issue-metadata {
          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }
      </style>


      




      




      


        


          

<slot></slot>


        

<div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>


      

<dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>


    




        

Email display settings

<h2>Email display settings</h2>



        

There is a 

setting

<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a>

 to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.

<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>



        

Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.

<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>



        

If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to 

get
        involved

<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a>

 in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.

<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>




        


          




      


        

<slot></slot>


      

<button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>


    




            Got it
          

<chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>


        

<div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>


      

<chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

This site hosts public issues in public projects

<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>



        

Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.

<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>



        

Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.

<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>



        





        


          




      


        

<slot></slot>


      

<button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>


    




            Got it
          

<chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>


        

<div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>


      

<chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>

          </chops-button>

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>



<br>





  - Download: 



<span class="line"><!---->  - Download: <!----></span>





https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878"><!---->https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878<!----></a>



<br>





  - other reproducible versions: 87.0.4258.0



<span class="line"><!---->  - other reproducible versions: 87.0.4258.0<!----></span>



<br>





  - The "showDirectoryPicker" API was introduced in 86



<span class="line"><!---->  - The "showDirectoryPicker" API was introduced in 86<!----></span>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/

 and click Buy

I was not able to reproduce the crash, but in a build with DCHECK enabled, we do fail a DCHECK. I'm not clear on the security implications of this particular DCHECK. Since it requires significant user interaction, especially within the payment handler, triaging as medium severity.



<span class="line"><!---->I was not able to reproduce the crash, but in a build with DCHECK enabled, we do fail a DCHECK. I'm not clear on the security implications of this particular DCHECK. Since it requires significant user interaction, especially within the payment handler, triaging as medium severity.<!----></span>

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481)<!----></span>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 <!----></span>



<br>

REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>

<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and click Buy 



<span class="line"><!----> and click Buy <!----></span>



<br>





4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom



<span class="line"><!---->4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom<!----></span>



<br>



<br>

<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese):<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->See the poc1.gif<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 2: <!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Select the default folder and select ok.<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Click the Back button<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->See the poc2.gif<!----></span>

#c2

 was due to 1166214.

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and click Buy 



<span class="line"><!----> and click Buy <!----></span>



<br>





4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom



<span class="line"><!---->4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom<!----></span>



<br>



<br>

<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese):<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->See the poc1.gif<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 2: <!----></span>



<br>

<span class="line"><!---->Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.<!----></span>



<br>





Select the default folder and select ok.



<span class="line"><!---->Select the default folder and select ok.<!----></span>

Click the Back button



<span class="line"><!---->Click the Back button<!----></span>

See the poc2.gif



<span class="line"><!---->See the poc2.gif<!----></span>

maxlg@ re 



<span class="line"><!---->maxlg@ re <!----></span>





#c15



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="#c15"><!---->#c15<!----></a>





 use-after-frees can readily be exploited by attackers to achieve arbitrary code execution. Attackers use the same underlying bug to corrupt memory in precise and deliberate ways rather than in a way which crashes. They have to carefully arrange other objects on the heap such that they control the data which is read during the UaF. This is fiddly, but attackers have versatile toolkits to make such things as reliable as possible.



<span class="line"><!----> use-after-frees can readily be exploited by attackers to achieve arbitrary code execution. Attackers use the same underlying bug to corrupt memory in precise and deliberate ways rather than in a way which crashes. They have to carefully arrange other objects on the heap such that they control the data which is read during the UaF. This is fiddly, but attackers have versatile toolkits to make such things as reliable as possible.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





As this is the browser process, that would give a remote attacker full access to the device and all cross-origin data. As such browser process use-after-frees are usually Critical severity and priority 0, usually necessitating an emergency refresh of Chrome pushed to all our users within a few days. In this case, its severity is mitigated down to Medium by the need to install payment methods and interact with the UI.



<span class="line"><!---->As this is the browser process, that would give a remote attacker full access to the device and all cross-origin data. As such browser process use-after-frees are usually Critical severity and priority 0, usually necessitating an emergency refresh of Chrome pushed to all our users within a few days. In this case, its severity is mitigated down to Medium by the need to install payment methods and interact with the UI.<!----></span>

<div class="issue-diff">
        <!---->

          maxlg@chromium.org

Security sheriff here: Assigning this back to maxlg@. We try to keep all security bugs assigned to owners so that there is someone responsible for moving them toward resolution.



<span class="line"><!---->Security sheriff here: Assigning this back to maxlg@. We try to keep all security bugs assigned to owners so that there is someone responsible for moving them toward resolution.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





As for severity, it's possible that this isn't reachable in normal released builds, but something triggering in ASAN typically just means its _easier_ to trigger there (in that ASAN causes it to be a crash instead of silent memory corruption). Unlike for features that are disabled in release builds (e.g., features behind the Experimental Web Platform Features flag), we don't downgrade the Security_Impact of bugs that only repro in ASAN.



<span class="line"><!---->As for severity, it's possible that this isn't reachable in normal released builds, but something triggering in ASAN typically just means its _easier_ to trigger there (in that ASAN causes it to be a crash instead of silent memory corruption). Unlike for features that are disabled in release builds (e.g., features behind the Experimental Web Platform Features flag), we don't downgrade the Security_Impact of bugs that only repro in ASAN.<!----></span>

The prowser process crash log:



<span class="line"><!---->The prowser process crash log:<!----></span>



<br>





(2cc0.2ff4): Access violation - code c0000005 (first chance)



<span class="line"><!---->(2cc0.2ff4): Access violation - code c0000005 (first chance)<!----></span>



<br>





First chance exceptions are reported before any exception handling.



<span class="line"><!---->First chance exceptions are reported before any exception handling.<!----></span>



<br>





This exception may be expected and handled.



<span class="line"><!---->This exception may be expected and handled.<!----></span>



<br>





chrome_7ffd672c0000!ovly_debug_event+0x1ea219b:



<span class="line"><!---->chrome_7ffd672c0000!ovly_debug_event+0x1ea219b:<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->, that fix (for a different bug) is in canary 92.0.4479.0, and I can't reproduce this crash myself, but <!----></span>





#c22



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="#c22"><!---->#c22<!----></a>





 reproduced on 92.0.4479.3 so it's unlikely that fixed this bug as well. The crash steps also don't involve multiple browser windows so my patch should be unrelated.



<span class="line"><!----> reproduced on 92.0.4479.3 so it's unlikely that fixed this bug as well. The crash steps also don't involve multiple browser windows so my patch should be unrelated.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Based on the recordings and stack traces the issue looks to be when PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController navigates to an external URL (which should probably just be aborted?)



<span class="line"><!---->Based on the recordings and stack traces the issue looks to be when PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController navigates to an external URL (which should probably just be aborted?)<!----></span>

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>



<br>





  - Example: 



<span class="line"><!---->  - Example: <!----></span>





https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878"><!---->https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878<!----></a>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and click Buy 



<span class="line"><!----> and click Buy <!----></span>



<br>





4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom



<span class="line"><!---->4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese (maxlg@: unnecessary info)):



<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese (maxlg@: unnecessary info)):<!----></span>

See the poc1.gif



<span class="line"><!---->See the poc1.gif<!----></span>

Reprodeuce Method 2: 



<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 2: <!----></span>



<br>





Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.



<span class="line"><!---->Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.<!----></span>



<br>





Select the default folder and select ok.



<span class="line"><!---->Select the default folder and select ok.<!----></span>



<br>





Click the Back button



<span class="line"><!---->Click the Back button<!----></span>



<br>





See the poc2.gif



<span class="line"><!---->See the poc2.gif<!----></span>

<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b>

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>



<br>





  - Example: 



<span class="line"><!---->  - Example: <!----></span>





https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878"><!---->https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878<!----></a>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and click Buy 



<span class="line"><!----> and click Buy <!----></span>



<br>





4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom



<span class="line"><!---->4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





maxlg@: an easier reproduction method - 



<span class="line"><!---->maxlg@: an easier reproduction method - <!----></span>





#c40



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="#c40"><!---->#c40<!----></a>



<br>



<br>





Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese (maxlg@: unnecessary info)):



<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 1(The easier one, Set the chromimu display language as Chinese (maxlg@: unnecessary info)):<!----></span>



<br>





See the poc1.gif



<span class="line"><!---->See the poc1.gif<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Reprodeuce Method 2: 



<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 2: <!----></span>



<br>





Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.



<span class="line"><!---->Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.<!----></span>



<br>





Select the default folder and select ok.



<span class="line"><!---->Select the default folder and select ok.<!----></span>



<br>





Click the Back button



<span class="line"><!---->Click the Back button<!----></span>



<br>





See the poc2.gif

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





VERSION



<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b>



<br>





Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>



<br>





  - Download: 



<span class="line"><!---->  - Download: <!----></span>





https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878"><!---->https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chromium-browser-asan/index.html?prefix=linux-release/asan-linux-release-867878<!----></a>



<br>





  - other reproducible versions: 87.0.4258.0



<span class="line"><!---->  - other reproducible versions: 87.0.4258.0<!----></span>



<br>





Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux



<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 , Linux<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





REPRODUCTION CASE



<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b>



<br>



<br>





You can see the gif poc directly~



<span class="line"><!---->You can see the gif poc directly~<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Prepare:



<span class="line"><!---->Prepare:<!----></span>



<br>





1. open 



<span class="line"><!---->1. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/navigation-tester/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





2. open 



<span class="line"><!---->2. open <!----></span>





https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://skilful-reserve-239412.appspot.com/static/apps/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and install



<span class="line"><!----> and install<!----></span>



<br>





3. open 



<span class="line"><!---->3. open <!----></span>





https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/"><!---->https://maxlgu.github.io/pr/max-nonbasiccard/<!----></a>





 and click Buy 



<span class="line"><!----> and click Buy <!----></span>



<br>





4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom



<span class="line"><!---->4. Navigate to a Dialog pop up Page and then click the Back button ,Boom<!----></span>



<br>



<br>

<span class="line"><!---->maxlg@: an easier reproduction method - <!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Reprodeuce Method 2: <!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Open the popup.html in the navigate textarea and click go.<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Select the default folder and select ok.<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Click the Back button<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->See the poc2.gif<!----></span>

  0x034b5c90adc0: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd



<span class="line"><!---->  0x034b5c90adc0: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd<!----></span>



<br>





  0x034b5c90add0: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd



<span class="line"><!---->  0x034b5c90add0: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd<!----></span>



<br>





  0x034b5c90ade0: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd



<span class="line"><!---->  0x034b5c90ade0: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd<!----></span>



<br>





=>0x034b5c90adf0: fd fd fd fd fd fd[fd]fd fd fa fa fa fa fa fa fa



<span class="line"><!---->=&gt;0x034b5c90adf0: fd fd fd fd fd fd[fd]fd fd fa fa fa fa fa fa fa<!----></span>

  0x034b5c90ae00: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

<span class="line"><!---->  Global init order:       f6<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->  Poisoned by user:        f7<!----></span>

I believe the description in 



<span class="line"><!---->I believe the description in <!----></span>





#c21



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="#c21"><!---->#c21<!----></a>





 is correct, and that the appropriate fix is for PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController to unset the dialog_manager_delegate_ on the WebContentsModalDialogManager before the delegate is destroyed.



<span class="line"><!----> is correct, and that the appropriate fix is for PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController to unset the dialog_manager_delegate_ on the WebContentsModalDialogManager before the delegate is destroyed.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





See an example of doing this for another dialog at 



<span class="line"><!---->See an example of doing this for another dialog at <!----></span>





https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/ash/login/ui/webui_login_view.cc;drc=3eb027037d29138f58f98356af0295fc17030f0e;l=142



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/ash/login/ui/webui_login_view.cc;drc=3eb027037d29138f58f98356af0295fc17030f0e;l=142"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/ash/login/ui/webui_login_view.cc;drc=3eb027037d29138f58f98356af0295fc17030f0e;l=142<!----></a>

The following revision refers to this bug:



<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span>



<br>





  



<span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>





https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb<!----></a>



<br>



<br>





commit 



<span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>





8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb"><!---->8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb<!----></a>



<br>





Author: Liquan (Max) Gu <



<span class="line"><!---->Author: Liquan (Max) Gu &lt;<!----></span>





maxlg@chromium.org



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/maxlg@chromium.org"><!---->maxlg@chromium.org<!----></a>





>



<span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span>



<br>





Date: Fri Apr 23 21:53:25 2021



<span class="line"><!---->Date: Fri Apr 23 21:53:25 2021<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI



<span class="line"><!---->Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the



<span class="line"><!---->payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value<!----></span>



<br>





pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view



<span class="line"><!---->pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view<!----></span>



<br>





stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset



<span class="line"><!---->stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,<!----></span>



<br>





the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into



<span class="line"><!---->the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free<!----></span>



<br>





crash.



<span class="line"><!---->crash.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





This CL fixes this issue by making sure



<span class="line"><!---->This CL fixes this issue by making sure<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Bug: 1194058



<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1194058" title="Security:  heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process "><!---->Bug: 1194058<!----></a>



<br>

This bug requires manual review: M91's targeted beta branch promotion date has already passed, so this requires manual review



<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: M91's targeted beta branch promotion date has already passed, so this requires manual review<!----></span>



<br>





Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:



<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?



<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span>



<br>





- Chrome: 



<span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>





https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge

<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a>



<br>





2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.



<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span>



<br>





3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?



<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span>



<br>





4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?



<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span>



<br>





5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?



<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span>



<br>





6. Is this a new feature?



<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span>



<br>





7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?



<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Chrome OS Only:



<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span>



<br>





8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: 



<span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>





http://go/cros-engprodcomponents



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a>

Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.

1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?



<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span>



<br>





- Chrome: 



<span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>





https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge

<br>





- Chrome OS: 



<span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>





https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a>



<br>





Yes



<span class="line"><!---->Yes<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.



<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span>



<br>





https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2844509



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2844509"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2844509<!----></a>



<br>



<br>





3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?



<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span>



<br>





Yes



<span class="line"><!---->Yes<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?



<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span>



<br>





M91, M90



<span class="line"><!---->M91, M90<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?



<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span>



<br>





This is a use-after-free bug which can readily be exploited by attackers to achieve arbitrary code execution. As this is the browser process, that would give a remote attacker full access to the device and all cross-origin data. As such browser process use-after-frees are usually Critical severity and priority 0, usually necessitating an emergency refresh of Chrome pushed to all our users within a few days. In this case, its severity is mitigated down to Medium by the need to install payment methods and interact with the UI.



<span class="line"><!---->This is a use-after-free bug which can readily be exploited by attackers to achieve arbitrary code execution. As this is the browser process, that would give a remote attacker full access to the device and all cross-origin data. As such browser process use-after-frees are usually Critical severity and priority 0, usually necessitating an emergency refresh of Chrome pushed to all our users within a few days. In this case, its severity is mitigated down to Medium by the need to install payment methods and interact with the UI.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





(Read 



<span class="line"><!---->(Read <!----></span>





#c18



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="#c18"><!---->#c18<!----></a>





 for context)



<span class="line"><!----> for context)<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





6. Is this a new feature?



<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span>



<br>





No



<span class="line"><!---->No<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?



<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span>



<br>





No



<span class="line"><!---->No<!----></span>

VULNERABILITY DETAILS



<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b>



<br>





heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.



<span class="line"><!---->heap-use-after-free in the payment dialog in the browser process which will excape the sandbox.<!----></span>

<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [91.0.4464.0] + [dev] (asan-win32-release_x64-867481) (not reproducible on official releases)<!----></span>

https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac<!----></a>



<br>

commit 



<span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>





08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac"><!---->08dbfa33cb45c3cfd0891a0c547c861060a110ac<!----></a>



<br>





Author: Liquan (Max) Gu <



<span class="line"><!---->Author: Liquan (Max) Gu &lt;<!----></span>





maxlg@chromium.org



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/maxlg@chromium.org"><!---->maxlg@chromium.org<!----></a>





>



<span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span>



<br>





Date: Mon Apr 26 20:20:20 2021



<span class="line"><!---->Date: Mon Apr 26 20:20:20 2021<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





[M91]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI



<span class="line"><!---->[M91]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the



<span class="line"><!---->payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value<!----></span>



<br>





pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view



<span class="line"><!---->pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view<!----></span>



<br>





stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset



<span class="line"><!---->stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,<!----></span>



<br>





the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into



<span class="line"><!---->the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free<!----></span>



<br>





crash.



<span class="line"><!---->crash.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





This CL fixes this issue by making sure



<span class="line"><!---->This CL fixes this issue by making sure<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





(cherry picked from commit 



<span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>





8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb"><!---->8f6ad3de87d3d7b375f75004b1389604887d31fb<!----></a>





)



<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span>

In general we would only approve merges to the current stable branch a few days before we make the next release, to give maximal bake time for problems to show up in Canary/beta/etc. That's probably about a week away.



<span class="line"><!---->In general we would only approve merges to the current stable branch a few days before we make the next release, to give maximal bake time for problems to show up in Canary/beta/etc. That's probably about a week away.<!----></span>

*** Boilerplate reminders! ***



<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span>



<br>





Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.



<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





Please contact 



<span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>





security-vrp@chromium.org



<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a>





 with any questions.



<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span>

[M90]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI



<span class="line"><!---->[M90]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the



<span class="line"><!---->payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value<!----></span>



<br>





pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view



<span class="line"><!---->pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view<!----></span>



<br>





stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset



<span class="line"><!---->stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,<!----></span>



<br>





the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into



<span class="line"><!---->the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free<!----></span>



<br>





crash.



<span class="line"><!---->crash.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





This CL fixes this issue by making sure



<span class="line"><!---->This CL fixes this issue by making sure<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.<!----></span>



<br>

[M90]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI



<span class="line"><!---->[M90]Clean up WebContentsModalDialogManagerDelegate in desktop Payment UI<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the



<span class="line"><!---->payment_request_dialog_view's controller_map_ store the<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController and its web-view as a key-value<!----></span>



<br>





pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view



<span class="line"><!---->pair. When the view is popped from payment_request_dialog_view's view<!----></span>



<br>





stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset



<span class="line"><!---->stack, the key-pair will be destroyed. If the controller doesn't reset<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate in the controller's destructor,<!----></span>



<br>





the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into



<span class="line"><!---->the WebView's destructor will attempt to access into<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate, and cause a use-after-free<!----></span>



<br>





crash.



<span class="line"><!---->crash.<!----></span>



<br>



<br>





This CL fixes this issue by making sure



<span class="line"><!---->This CL fixes this issue by making sure<!----></span>



<br>





PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets



<span class="line"><!---->PaymentHandlerWebFlowViewController's destructor resets<!----></span>



<br>





WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.



<span class="line"><!---->WebContentsModalDialogManager's delegate.<!----></span>

 issue

<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>


          


            

Target project:

<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>


            


              

<input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">


              




      


        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      

<style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;

          cursor: pointer;

          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);

<mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      <div class="chops-autocomplete-container">
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    <!----></mr-autocomplete>

              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">

Blocked on issues

<span>Blocked on issues</span>


          


            

close

<i class="material-icons">close</i>


          

<button aria-label="close">
            <i class="material-icons">close</i>
          </button>


        

<h3 class="medium-heading">
          <span>Blocked on issues</span>
          <button aria-label="close">
            <i class="material-icons">close</i>
          </button>
        </h3>


        




        


          


            




            




              



Issue



<th><!---->Issue<!----></th>


            




              



Summary



<th><!---->Summary<!----></th>


            




          

<tr>
            
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Issue<!----></th>
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Summary<!----></th>
            <!---->
          </tr>



          


        

<tbody>
          <tr>
            
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Issue<!----></th>
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Summary<!----></th>
            <!---->
          </tr>

          
        </tbody>

<table><tbody>
          <tr>
            
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Issue<!----></th>
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Summary<!----></th>
            <!---->
          </tr>

          
        </tbody></table>


      

<chops-dialog closeonoutsideclick="">
        <h3 class="medium-heading">
          <span>Blocked on issues</span>
          <button aria-label="close">
            <i class="material-icons">close</i>
          </button>
        </h3>
        
        <table><tbody>
          <tr>
            
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Issue<!----></th>
            <!---->
              <th><!---->Summary<!----></th>
            <!---->
          </tr>

          
        </tbody></table>
      </chops-dialog>

        mr-issue-page {

            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }

            min-height: 0;

          position: sticky;
          overflow-y: auto;
          top: var(--monorail-header-height);
          height: calc(100vh - var(--monorail-header-height));
        }
        mr-launch-overview {
          border-left: var(--chops-normal-border);
          padding-left: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          padding-right: var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          flex-grow: 0;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          width: 50%;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          min-height: 100%;
        }
        @media (max-width: 1126px) {
          .container-issue-content {
            flex-direction: column;
            padding: 0 var(--mr-issue-page-horizontal-padding);
          }
          mr-issue-details, mr-launch-overview {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
        }
        @media (max-width: 840px) {
          .container-outside {
            flex-direction: column;
          }
          .metadata-container {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border: 0;
            border-bottom: var(--chops-normal-border);
          }
          mr-issue-metadata {
            min-width: auto;
            max-width: auto;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
            min-height: 0;
            border: 0;
          }
          mr-issue-metadata, .issue-header-container {
            position: static;
          }
        }
      </style>
      <mr-click-throughs></mr-click-throughs>
      
        <div class="container-outside" id="issue">
          <aside class="metadata-container">
            <mr-issue-metadata></mr-issue-metadata>
          </aside>
          <div class="container-issue">
            <div class="issue-header-container">
              <mr-issue-header></mr-issue-header>

              <mr-migrated-banner hidden=""></mr-migrated-banner>

            <div class="container-issue-content">
              <mr-issue-details class="main-item"><!---->
      <style>
        mr-issue-details {

 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }

 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });

<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
